extends Object
    Methods for checking preconditions.

    Ayco Holleman

    • Method Detail

      • that

        public static <T extends Exception> void that​(boolean condition,
                                              Supplier<T> exceptionSupplier)
                                       throws T extends Exception
        Generic check method. Can also be used for other purposes than checking preconditions. Throws the exception supplied by the provided supplier if the provided condition evaluates to false.
        Type Parameters:
        T - The type of exception thrown if the condition fails
        Parameters:
        condition - The condition to evaluate
        exceptionSupplier - The exception supplier
        Throws:
        T - The exception thrown if the condition fails
        T extends Exception

      • that

        public static <T extends Exception,​U> U that​(boolean condition,
                                                   U result,
                                                   Supplier<T> exceptionSupplier)
                                            throws T extends Exception
        Generic check method. Can also be used for other purposes than checking preconditions. Throws the exception supplied by the provided exception supplier if the provided condition evaluates to false, else returns result.
        Type Parameters:
        T - The type of exception thrown if the condition fails
        U - The type of object returned if the condition is met
        Parameters:
        condition - The condition to evaluate
        result - The object returned if the condition is met
        exceptionSupplier - The exception supplier
        Returns:
        The object supplied by the resultSupplier
        Throws:
        T - The exception thrown if the condition fails
        T extends Exception

      • that

        public static <T extends Exception,​U> U that​(boolean condition,
                                                   Supplier<U> resultSupplier,
                                                   Supplier<T> exceptionSupplier)
                                            throws T extends Exception
        Generic check method. Can also be used for other purposes than checking preconditions. Throws the exception supplied by the provided exception supplier if the provided condition evaluates to false, else returns the result supplied by the result supplier.
        Type Parameters:
        T - The type of exception thrown if the condition fails
        U - The type of object returned if the condition is met
        Parameters:
        condition - The condition to evaluate
        resultSupplier - The result supplier
        exceptionSupplier - The exception supplier
        Returns:
        The object supplied by the resultSupplier
        Throws:
        T - The exception thrown if the condition fails
        T extends Exception

        public static void argument​(boolean condition,
                            String message,
                            Object msgArg,
                            Object... moreMsgArgs)
        Does nothing if the provided condition evaluates to true, else throws an IllegalArgumentException with the provided message and message arguments.
        Parameters:
        condition - The condition to be evaluated
        message - The exception message
        msgArg - The 1st String.format message argument
        moreMsgArgs - The remaining String.format message arguments
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - If the condition evaluates to false

      • argument

        public static <T> T argument​(T arg,
                             Predicate<T> test,
                             String message,
                             Object msgArg,
                             Object... moreMsgArgs)
        Returns arg if it passes the provided test, else throws an IllegalArgumentException with the provided message and message arguments. msgArg is allowed to be null, in which case it is ignored as a message argument.
        Type Parameters:
        T -
        Parameters:
        arg -
        test -
        message -
        msgArg -
        moreMsgArgs -
        Returns:

      • notNull

        public static <T> T notNull​(T arg)
        Returns arg if it is not null, else throws an IllegalArgumentException with the message: Illegal argument: null.
        Type Parameters:
        T - The type of the argument being tested
        Parameters:
        arg - The argument being tested
        Returns:
        The argument
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - If the argument is null

      • notNull

        public static <T> T notNull​(T arg,
                            String argName)
        Returns arg if it is not null, else throws an IllegalArgumentException with the message: <argName> must not be null. In other words, the 2nd argument is not supposed to be a complete message but just the name of the argument being tested. For example: 
         public void accelerate(Engine engine) {
   Check.notNull(engine, "engine"); // engine must not be null
 }
        Type Parameters:
        T - The type of the argument being tested
        Parameters:
        arg - The argument being tested
        argName - The name of the argument being tested
        Returns:
        The argument
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - If the argument is null

      • notNull

        public static <T> T notNull​(T arg,
                            String message,
                            Object msgArg,
                            Object... moreMsgArgs)
        Returns arg if it is not null, else throws an IllegalArgumentException with the provided message and message arguments. msgArg is allowed to be null, in which case it is ignored as a message argument.
        Type Parameters:
        T - The type of the argument being tested
        Parameters:
        arg - The argument being tested
        message - The exception message
        msgArg - The 1st String.format message argument
        moreMsgArgs - The remaining String.format message arguments
        Returns:
        The argument
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - If the argument is null

      • state

        public static void state​(boolean condition,
                         String message)
        Does nothing if the provided condition evaluates to true, else throws an IllegalStateException with the provided message.
        Parameters:
        condition - The condition to be evaluated
        message - The exception message
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - If the condition evaluates to false

      • state

        public static void state​(boolean condition,
                         String message,
                         Object msgArg,
                         Object... moreMsgArgs)
        Does nothing if the provided condition evaluates to true, else throws an IllegalStateException with the provided message and message arguments. msgArg is allowed to be null, in which case it is ignored as a message argument.
        Parameters:
        condition -
        message - The exception message
        msgArg - The 1st String.format message argument
        moreMsgArgs - The remaining String.format message arguments
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - If the condition evaluates to false
